code: import React from"react";import image_1 from'../assets/image-1.png';import image_2 from'../assets/image-2.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StudentCard=_ref=>{let{post}=_ref;let image='';if(post.jenis_kelamin==='Laki-laki'){image=image_2;}else{image=image_1;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"student-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-max",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"photo-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"angga",style:{width:'100px',height:'100px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nama-siswa-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"nama-siswa-lengkap",style:{overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis',whiteSpace:'nowrap',marginTop:'16px'},children:post.nama}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"perusahaan-divisi-card",style:{color:'#605B57',fontSize:'20px',marginTop:'10px'},children:[post.perusahaan," - ",post.posisi]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-text",style:{lineHeight:'28px',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis',wordWrap:'break-word'},children:post.deskripsi_magang})]});};export default StudentCard;
